options.content: Ethereum Base Solana TON
Global US West EU SG

#### Description

This dashboard provides real-time and historical performance analytics for RPC nodes across major providers.

* Click region buttons to view metrics from different locations
* Adjust time range for historical analysis
* Hover over info icons for detailed metric descriptions

panels.title: What is the average response time and overall success rate?

panels.description: Average response time across all metrics per provider, segmented by request origin region.
panels.title: By data collection region

panels.description: Success rate of requests where response has 200 status code and contains no error field in JSON RPC response.
panels.title: Success rate

options.content:
#### Data collection

Response times are measured by our Python service deployed to Vercel serverless functions, sending requests every minute from San Francisco (US), Frankfurt (Germany), and Singapore.

Response times exceeding 35 seconds are considered failures and excluded from charts.

panels.description: Average response time per API method for each provider, aggregated across all regions. Block timestamp delay in eth_subscribe("newHeads")  represents the difference between block timestamp and its reception time.
panels.title: By API method
What is the average response time in each region?

panels.description: Average response time per provider-region pair, showing response times between each collection location and provider endpoint.
Average response time per provider-region pair, showing response times between each collection location and provider endpoint.
Average response time per provider-region pair, showing response times between each collection location and provider endpoint.

options.content:
#### How we rank providers

We evaluate RPC providers based on their **speed** (response time) and **reliability** (success rate) across three regions.

* The **lower** the score, the **better** the provider
* Even small success rate drops (99% vs 97%) significantly impact the final score
* Performance is measured equally across all regions

For each region:
```plaintext
RegionScore = 1 / ((1/ResponseTime) × (SuccessRate³))
```
Total score is the average of three region scores.

targets.expr:
sort(
  1 / (
    (
      1 / avg by (provider, source_region) (
        avg_over_time(
          response_latency_seconds{blockchain="Ethereum", response_status="success"}[$__range]
        )
      )
    )
    *
    (
      (
        sum by (provider, source_region) (rate(response_latency_seconds{blockchain="Ethereum", response_status="success"}[$__range]))
        /
        sum by (provider, source_region) (rate(response_latency_seconds{blockchain="Ethereum"}[$__range]))
      )
      *
      (
        sum by (provider, source_region) (rate(response_latency_seconds{blockchain="Ethereum", response_status="success"}[$__range]))
        /
        sum by (provider, source_region) (rate(response_latency_seconds{blockchain="Ethereum"}[$__range]))
      )
      *
      (
        sum by (provider, source_region) (rate(response_latency_seconds{blockchain="Ethereum", response_status="success"}[$__range]))
        /
        sum by (provider, source_region) (rate(response_latency_seconds{blockchain="Ethereum"}[$__range]))
      )
    )
  )
)

panels.description: Historical response time per provider-region pair, showing trends in eth_call requests.
panels.title: eth_call

panels.description: Success rate of requests where response has 200 status code and contains no error field in JSON RPC response.

targets.expr:
sum(count_over_time(response_latency_seconds{blockchain="Ethereum", api_method="eth_call", response_status="success"}[$__range])) by (provider, source_region)
/
sum(count_over_time(response_latency_seconds{blockchain="Ethereum", api_method="eth_call"}[$__range])) by (provider, source_region)

panels.title: Success rate
